description: If you have a Yeti, summon an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link>. Otherwise, create one on top of your deck.
descriptionRaw: If you have a Yeti, summon an Enraged Yeti. Otherwise, create one on top of your deck.
flavorText: "... and this one has a mouth fulla big jagged teeths an' smashy fists an super an-ger-y eyes an a HUUUGE TREE-SHAKING ROAR! Uncle Bjerg told me so!" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Tall Tales
